channel.title: Need help choosing
channel.description:
So I want to start a server again but havent attempted for like 2 years now.
I only have knowledge in delta which im guessing now is sh*t compared to the new bases.
So couple questions
1. What would you suggest Hyperion or Shard?
2. Which of the two above have a better combat system and which is more stable?
3. Any tutorials ( I tried searching but couldnt find any beginner tutorials )
4. Download links to some that are clean, I found a shard one but it has MySQL which I rather not have atm.

item.title: Need help choosing
item.dc:creator: @Lucky_is_back Lucky is back
item.description:
@Lucky_is_back wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:3, topic:449739”]^@Jake He is saying that he wasn’t into rspss in 2 years, and Delta or PI are just giving terrible programming habits.
I suggest using Shards over Hyperion if you are a beginner, but later on consider Hyperion, RuneSource and Apollo.[/quote]

Thank you sir, you know any good bases I can work out of and also are there any beginner tuts I tried searching but only found some for specific problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help choosing
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

^@Jake He is saying that he wasn’t into rspss in 2 years so I don’t think he has a current server, and Delta or PI are just giving terrible programming habits.
I suggest using Shards over Hyperion if you are a beginner, but later on consider Hyperion, RuneSource and Apollo.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help choosing
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

any hyperion or shard is just gna be a setback, instead of looking for a “good” base you could just make your own current server good.
Thers nothing stopping a deta or project insanity from being just as stable as a hyperion server if u know how.

If u really want switch then i would go for hyperion.

Read full topic
